content: **sign up for my mailing list at https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80** hey everyone it s amy from curiouspapaya meet ginger the giant panda she was inspired by my favorite character as a kid a flat panda called tare panda she measures 14 in x 13 in 35 56 cm x 33 02 cm here s what you ll need for this project materials clover amour crochet 10 mm art no 1057/np jumbo size 7 chenille yarn in black 170 g and white 267 g here i m using sweet snuggles yarn by loops & threads note that you will need a little over 1 skein of white unless your gauge is extra tight mini patchworks scissors art no 493/cw quick locking stitch marker large art no 3032 jumbo darning needle art no 340 fiberfill stuffing ~680 g size 24 mm safety eyes black felt for the eyes and nose hot glue 1 https //curiouspapaya com/shop/patterns/popular/giant-panda-crochet-pattern/
